batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.1.1
batch_results.mapping_notes: Requirement 1.1.1 is about documentation and procedures, which cannot be programmatically checked using boto3 APIs.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.1.2
batch_results.mapping_notes: Requirement 1.1.2 involves documentation of roles and responsibilities, which cannot be programmatically checked using boto3 APIs.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.1
batch_results.mapping_notes: Requirement 1.2.1 involves configuration standards for NSC rulesets, which are not directly checkable via boto3 APIs as they pertain to policy documentation.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.1.1
batch_results.mapping_notes: Requirement 1.1.1 is about documentation and procedures, which cannot be programmatically checked using boto3 APIs.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.1.2
batch_results.mapping_notes: Requirement 1.1.2 involves documentation of roles and responsibilities, which cannot be programmatically checked using boto3 APIs.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.1

new_functions_needed.name: vpc_security_group_ruleset_configuration_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: Check if security group rulesets are defined and implemented according to configuration standards.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions directly check NSC ruleset configurations. Suggested a new function to check security group rulesets.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.2

new_functions_needed.name: vpc_network_configuration_change_tracking
new_functions_needed.rationale: Track changes to network configurations to ensure they are approved and managed according to change control processes.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions track changes to network configurations. Suggested a new function to track and verify changes.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.3

new_functions_needed.name: vpc_network_diagram_accuracy_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: Ensure network diagrams are accurate and reflect current VPC configurations.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions verify the accuracy of network diagrams. Suggested a new function to ensure diagrams match VPC configurations.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.3

new_functions_needed.name: vpc_network_diagram_accurate_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: To ensure that the network diagram accurately reflects all VPCs and their connections.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions directly check for the accuracy of network diagrams.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.4

new_functions_needed.name: vpc_data_flow_diagram_accurate_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: To ensure that data flow diagrams accurately reflect all data flows across VPCs.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions directly check for the accuracy of data-flow diagrams.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.5

new_functions_needed.name: ec2_security_group_approved_ports_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: To verify that only approved ports are open in security groups.

batch_results.mapping_notes: Existing functions partially cover the requirement by checking default security group rules, but do not verify business justification for all allowed ports.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.6

new_functions_needed.name: ec2_insecure_protocols_mitigation_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: To ensure that security features are implemented for insecure protocols.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions directly check for security features mitigating insecure protocols.

batch_results.title: PCI DSS 1.2.7

new_functions_needed.name: ec2_security_group_configuration_review_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: To verify that security group configurations are reviewed periodically.

batch_results.mapping_notes: No existing functions directly check for periodic review of NSC configurations.
